amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for the Environmental Programs and Management by 2 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment reduces funding for Environmental Programs and Management by $2 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mooney (WV) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mooney (WV) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Mooney (WV).
